page.title: 11 Questionaire
page.content: A questionaire about life in Margate was sent to each family in Drapers Mill. We received 210 responses. Some of the questions were about housing. 82% live in semi-detached or terraced. 25% said their home was built before the First World War, 29% said between the Wars, 31% said post Second World War and 15% live in housing built in the last 10 years. We asked about possessions. 68% have one or more cars and 89% one or more bicycles. 36% have one television whilst 60% have more than one, 37% possess a computer and 51% a video. 74% keep pets, most popular being a cat, but there were several somewhat strange pets mentioned, such as chickens, ponies, geese, a goat, ducks, frogs and 82 stick insects!
